attributes.action: Allow all CRB certificates to be portable between employers for the duration of 3 years.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
As a Supply teacher I have to have a current CRB certificate.  That is fine, but as I am employed by several agencies I have to pay for a CRB check by each agency.  Also, even though I do have one that is 'portable' I have had to have a new CRB check carried out as the 'portable' one is 13 months old.

These checks cost me £37.50 each time, multiply that by the number of employees who have to have these checks carried out.... Just where is this fortune going????
